subScenes.name: 欢迎问候
subScenes.description: 导游迎接团队并做初步介绍

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi everyone! I'm Lisa, your guide for today. Hope you're all ready for an awesome day!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 大家好！我是丽莎，今天你们的导游，希望你们准备好度过精彩的一天！

responses.text: Hi Lisa! We're super excited!
responses.text_cn: 嗨，丽莎！我们超期待的！

responses.text: Hello, nice to meet you. I'm looking forward to the tour.
responses.text_cn: 您好，很高兴认识您，我很期待这次游览。

responses.text: Hey!
responses.text_cn: 嘿！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用热情语气回应导游，建立友好氛围

qaPairs.speakerText: If you got any questions later, just raise your hand or come find me!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果之后有任何问题，举手或直接来找我就行！

responses.text: Got it, thanks!
responses.text_cn: 明白，谢谢！

responses.text: I'll be sure to ask if something's unclear.
responses.text_cn: 如果不清楚我一定会问。

responses.text: Okay.
responses.text_cn: 好的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 简短回应体现积极沟通态度

subScenes.name: 行程确认
subScenes.description: 游客确认今日行程安排和时间

qaPairs.speakerText: We'll hit the museum at 10, then lunch at 12:30, and the market closes at 4, so we gotta be back by 3:30.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们10点到博物馆，12点半吃午饭，市场4点关门，所以得3点半前回来。

responses.text: Wait, does that mean we only got 1.5 hours at the market?
responses.text_cn: 等等，那我们只有1个半小时逛市场吗？

responses.text: Sounds good! Is the museum ticket included?
responses.text_cn: 不错！博物馆门票包含在内吗？

responses.text: Got it.
responses.text_cn: 知道了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 追问细节确保不遗漏重要信息

qaPairs.speakerText: We're running a bit late, so we might skip the gift shop to make the train.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们有点晚了，可能得跳过礼品店赶火车。

responses.text: No problem—I'd rather not miss the train!
responses.text_cn: 没问题，我可不想误了火车！

responses.text: Can we at least stop for 5 minutes? I need to buy a souvenir.
responses.text_cn: 能至少停5分钟吗？我想买个纪念品。

responses.text: Okay, train first.
responses.text_cn: 好，先赶火车。

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据需求灵活提出请求或接受调整

subScenes.name: 拍照请求
subScenes.description: 游客请求导游帮忙拍照或合影

qaPairs.speakerText: This view is insane! Could you take a pic of me with the castle?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这景色太棒了！能帮我拍张和城堡的合影吗？

responses.text: Sure! Stand close to the wall—I'll get the whole thing.
responses.text_cn: 当然！站墙边，我帮你拍全。

responses.text: Of course! I'll take 3 shots—just say 'cheese'!
responses.text_cn: 当然！我拍三张，说‘茄子’就行！

responses.text: Yeah, no problem.
responses.text_cn: 行，没问题。

qaPairs.usageNote: 礼貌请求时，可加细节让对方更好帮忙

qaPairs.speakerText: Can you also take a group photo with all of us?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能帮我们所有人拍张合照吗？

responses.text: Absolutely! Everyone line up—I'll use the timer.
responses.text_cn: 当然！大家排好，我用定时拍摄。

responses.text: I'm not great with phones, but I'll try!
responses.text_cn: 我不太会用手机，但我试试！

responses.text: Sure!
responses.text_cn: 行！

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达理解对方能力，避免强求

subScenes.name: 休息与费用
subScenes.description: 游客询问休息点和额外消费情况

qaPairs.speakerText: We've been walking for an hour—any chance we can stop for coffee soon?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们走了快一小时了，能找个地方喝杯咖啡吗？

responses.text: We'll hit a café in 10 minutes—perfect timing!
responses.text_cn: 10分钟后有个咖啡馆，时间刚刚好！

responses.text: Could we stop now? My feet are killing me.
responses.text_cn: 现在能停一下吗？我脚快断了。

responses.text: Okay, thanks.
responses.text_cn: 好，谢谢。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用身体感受表达需求，更易获得同情

qaPairs.speakerText: The entrance fee to the temple's $10 extra—cash only.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 寺庙门票另收10美元，只收现金。

responses.text: Do you have a place nearby to exchange money?
responses.text_cn: 附近有能换钱的地方吗？

responses.text: I'll just skip it then—I'm out of cash.
responses.text_cn: 那我就不去了，我没现金了。

responses.text: Got it.
responses.text_cn: 知道了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确财务状况，避免尴尬或误判

subScenes.name: 道别感谢
subScenes.description: 行程结束时游客向导游表达感谢

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for today, Lisa! You made it so fun and easy!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 谢谢你今天的一切，丽莎！你让旅程太轻松有趣了！

responses.text: You're so welcome! Hope you come back next time!
responses.text_cn: 不客气！希望下次还能见到你们！

responses.text: It was my pleasure! Don't forget to leave a review!
responses.text_cn: 我很开心！别忘了给个好评哦！

responses.text: No worries!
responses.text_cn: 别客气！

qaPairs.usageNote: 真诚感谢能提升服务体验与评价

qaPairs.speakerText: If you loved the tour, I'd really appreciate a 5-star rating on the app!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果喜欢今天的行程，麻烦在App上给个五星好评吧！

responses.text: Definitely! I'll rate you right now!
responses.text_cn: 一定！我现在就给你打五星！

responses.text: I'll try, but I'm not great with apps.
responses.text_cn: 我会试试，但我不太会用App。

responses.text: Sure thing.
responses.text_cn: 没问题。

qaPairs.usageNote: 即使不擅长，也应给予积极反馈
